title: For the love of god, enough with the bright and heroic Lux skins!
body:
Pretty sure there are enough Lux skins that make her appear as some sort of bright, joyful or heroic person. Why is there not a darker themed Lux skin? Jayce just got a Forsaken skin despite being a heroic figure, so where is Lux's? I'm not saying her new skin looks bad, I'm just saying it doesn't really make her seem overly different to her core character. Dark Necromancer Lux where?!
Bump if you agree =)

replies.body: Most of Lux's skins are good but I have to agree, there too bright and heroic. Needs to be darker.
